properties.areaDesc: Ventura County Coast; Los Angeles County Coast including Downtown Los Angeles
properties.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 1 at 4:26AM PST until March 1 at 8:00PM PST by NWS Los Angeles/Oxnard CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...West winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 40 mph
expected. strongest along the coast

* WHERE...Ventura County Coast and Los Angeles County Coast
including Downtown Los Angeles.

* WHEN...From noon today to 8 PM PST this evening.

* IMPACTS...Gusty winds will make driving difficult and could blow
around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a
few power outages may result.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Roadways affected by gusty winds include
Pacific Coast Highway, Highways 101...105 and the 405.
properties.instruction:
Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high
profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

NWSheadline: WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 8 PM PST THIS EVENING
